alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greenwood County through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Greenwood, or 8 miles southwest of Ninety Six Historic Site, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Lake Greenwood State Park, Greenwood State Park, Ninety Six Historic Site, Lake Greenwood, Kirksey, Dyson, Epworth and Callison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
